subject: ConnectedDrivingPipelineV4 Fresh Run - Alignment Notice
message: Aaron requested a complete fresh restart of all 36 pipelines on jaekel server. I am handling this directly with an Opus audit sub-agent. All caches, results, and logs have been cleared. The jaekel-pipeline-monitor cron (Sonnet) will monitor and send email when complete. Please do not spawn any tasks related to this project - it's being handled at the main session level.
